titles.title: National Education Goal for Parental Participation Act
To establish an additional National Education Goal relating to parental participation in both the formal and informal education of their children, and for other purposes.

bill.summary: 7/22/1993--Introduced. National Education Goal for Parental Participation Act - Directs the National Education Goals Panel to establish as an additional National Education Goal that, by the year 2000, every school and home will engage in partnerships that will increase parental involvement and participation in promoting the social, emotional, and academic growth of children.
